longDef.en: to produce something, often using a particular substance or material

examples.en: Do you want me to make some coffee?
examples.cn: 要我煮些咖啡吗？

examples.en: He made a chocolate cake.
examples.cn: 他做了一个巧克力蛋糕。

examples.en: She makes all her own clothes.
examples.cn: 她所有的衣服都是自己做的。

examples.en: He made us some coffee./He made some coffee for us.
examples.cn: 他为我们煮了些咖啡。

examples.en: The pot is made to withstand high temperatures.
examples.cn: 这个罐子是为能耐高温而制作的。

examples.en: He works for a company that makes furniture.
examples.cn: 他为一家生产庭院家具的公司工作。

examples.en: The label on the box said "made in China".
examples.cn: 盒子上的标签写着“中国制造”。

examples.en: Butter is made out of/from milk.
examples.cn: 黄油由牛奶制成。

examples.en: earrings made of gold
examples.cn: 金制的耳环

examples.en: Her new trainer has promised to make an Olympic athlete of her.
examples.cn: 她的新教练许诺将她培养成奥运选手。

longDef.en: To make a film or television programme is to direct, produce it, or act in it.

examples.en: John Huston made some great movies.
examples.cn: 约翰•休斯顿执导过一些十分优秀的影片。

examples.en: The movie was made by Goldcrest Productions.
examples.cn: 这部影片是由金冠制片公司出品的。

examples.en: So why didn't Garbo make any films after 1941?
examples.cn: 为何嘉宝1941年后就不再拍电影了？

examples.en: The kids made a real mess in the kitchen.
examples.cn: 孩子们将厨房弄得一团糟。

examples.en: The bullet made a hole right through his chest.
examples.cn: 子弹射穿了他的胸膛。

examples.en: The wind is making my eyes water.
examples.cn: 风吹得我眼睛直流泪。

examples.en: What made you change your mind?
examples.cn: 什么使你改变了想法？

examples.en: Just seeing Woody Allen's face is enough to make me laugh.
examples.cn: 只要看一眼伍迪•艾伦的脸就足以使我发笑。

examples.en: The photograph makes me look about 80!
examples.cn: 照片上的我看上去快80岁了！

longDef.en: to cause to be, to become, or to appear as

examples.en: It's the good weather that makes Spain such a popular tourist destination.
examples.cn: 好天气使西班牙成为旅游胜地。

examples.en: She had to shout to make herself heard above the sound of the music.
examples.cn: 她只有大声喊叫才能盖过音乐声让别人听到她的声音。

examples.en: I can make myself understood in French, but I'm not fluent.
examples.cn: 我说法语别人可以懂，但不流利。

examples.en: They went up to the Ambassador and made themselves known (to her).
examples.cn: 他们走到大使跟前，（向她）作了自我介绍。

examples.en: The company accounts have not yet been made public.
examples.cn: 公司账务至今尚未公开。

examples.en: The book's advertised as "navigation made easy".
examples.cn: 这本书的广告宣传词是“航海不再难”。

examples.en: The president has made Henry Paulson his Secretary of the Treasury.
examples.cn: 总统已任命亨利·保尔森为财政部长。

examples.en: I'll have a steak - no, make that chicken.
examples.cn: 我要一份牛排——不，改成鸡肉。

longDef.en: to take action so that you are certain that something happens, is true, etc.:
longDef.cn: 我要确认一下是否关掉了烤箱。

examples.en: I'll just make sure I've turned the oven off.
examples.cn: 我要确认一下是否关掉了烤箱。

longDef.en: to force someone or something to do something:
longDef.cn: 如果他不想去，你不能强迫他去。

examples.en: You can't make him go if he doesn't want to.
examples.cn: 如果他不想去，你不能强迫他去。

longDef.en: to be forced to do something:
longDef.cn: 囚犯们被强迫挖洞，然后再把它们填上。

examples.en: The prisoners are made to dig holes and fill them up again.
examples.cn: 囚犯们被强迫挖洞，然后再把它们填上。

examples.en: I have to make a phone call.
examples.cn: 我必须打个电话。

examples.en: Somebody has made a donation of £1 million to the charity Oxfam.
examples.cn: 有人向乐施会捐赠了100万英镑。

examples.en: I need to make a doctor's appointment.
examples.cn: 我需要约一个时间见医生。

examples.en: On foot they could only make about 20 miles a day.
examples.cn: 靠步行，他们每天只能走20英里左右。

examples.en: We must make a decision by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 到明天为止我们必须作出决定。

examples.en: You're not making any effort.
examples.cn: 你一点儿都不努力。

examples.en: Someone has made a mistake/an error.
examples.cn: 有人犯了错误／出了差错。

examples.en: We're making good progress.
examples.cn: 我们进展顺利。

examples.en: She has made a request for a new car.
examples.cn: 她申请要一辆新汽车。

examples.en: We made an offer of £450,000 for the house.
examples.cn: 我们出价45万英镑买这座房子。

examples.en: She made a short speech.
examples.cn: 她作了简短的发言。

examples.en: Is it time to make a start on the work?
examples.cn: 我们可以开始工作了吗？

examples.en: Can I make a suggestion?
examples.cn: 我能否提个建议？

examples.en: We made good time getting across town.
examples.cn: 我们开车高速穿过了市区。

examples.en: There's a drunk at the door making trouble.
examples.cn: 有个醉汉在门口闹事。

longDef.en: If you make room/space/way for something or someone, you move your body or move other things, so that there is space for it or them:

examples.en: I was wondering if I could make room for a grand piano somewhere in my house.

longDef.en: to pull up and tidy the covers on a bed after it has been slept in:
longDef.cn: 她匆忙上楼，飞快地整理了床铺。

examples.en: She hurried upstairs and quickly made the beds.
examples.cn: 她匆忙上楼，飞快地整理了床铺。

longDef.en: to produce a total when added together

examples.en: 12 and 12 make 24.
Today's earthquake makes five since the beginning of the year.
examples.cn: 今天的地震是今年以来的第5次。

examples.en: I have 29 different teapots in my collection - if I buy this one that'll make it 30.
examples.cn: 我已经收集了29个各式各样的茶壶——如果买下这个，就有30个了。

examples.en: How much do you make the total?
examples.cn: 你算出的总数是多少？

examples.en: I make the answer (to be) 105.6.
examples.cn: 我算出的答案是105.6。

examples.en: What do you make the time?/What time do you make it?
examples.cn: 你估计现在几点了？

examples.en: She makes $100,000 a year as a doctor.
examples.cn: 她行医每年收入10万美元。

examples.en: How do you make a living as a painter?
examples.cn: 你当画家如何谋生？

examples.en: The company has made huge profits/losses.
examples.cn: 公司盈利丰厚／亏损严重。

examples.en: He's very good at making new friends.
examples.cn: 他善于结交新朋友。

longDef.en: to arrive at or reach, especially successfully

examples.en: She made it to the airport just in time to catch her plane.
examples.cn: 她及时赶到机场，搭上了班机。

examples.en: He made it to the bed and then collapsed.
examples.cn: 他走到床边便倒下了。

examples.en: Could you make a meeting at 8 a.m.?/Could you make an 8 a.m. meeting?
examples.cn: 你能在早上8点碰面吗？

longDef.en: to succeed in getting a place in a team

examples.en: She failed to make the Olympic squad.
examples.cn: 她未能加入奥林匹克队。

longDef.en: to appear as a story in the news

examples.en: His story made the papers back home.
examples.cn: 他的故事上了家乡的报纸。

examples.en: The civil war in Mozambique made few headlines around the globe.
examples.cn: 莫桑比克内战在世界上不是头条新闻。

examples.en: Those little bows around the neck really make the dress!
examples.cn: 领口的小蝴蝶结确实为这条连衣裙锦上添花！

longDef.en: a type of product or the name of the company that made it

examples.en: What make is your laptop?
examples.cn: 你的笔记本电脑是什么牌子的？
